revision.text:
{{codepointer|r=Strife|Weapon}} '''A_ShowElectricFlash'''
(''no parameter'')
Plays the Flash state without any change to the external player sprite. Essentially identical to doing the following: XBOW A 0 [[A_GunFlash]] ("Flash", GFF_NOEXTCHANGE) This codepointer is restricted to {{Class|StrifeCrossbow}} and derived classes.
